snippet: The first presidential debate did little to change the views of two families in a crucial battleground state.
abstract: Attendees at a small viewing party in Worthington, Ohio, a suburb of Columbus, say the first presidential debate did little to sway their opinions on the candidates one way or another.
lead_paragraph: The first presidential debate did little to change the views of two families in a crucial battleground state.

headline.main: At Debate-Watching Party in Suburban Ohio, Voters Are Less Than Thrilled
headline.print_headline: At Debate-Watching Party in Suburban Ohio, Voters Are Less Than Thrilled
